SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthToken
Sets the structure for the AuthToken table in the database
AuthTokenDAO
Responsible for accessing the data for the AuthToken
ClearHandler
The Http handler for clearing request.
ClearResult
This class is responsible to handle the clearing of the results that we get from the web API calls.
ClearService
This class is responsible to handle the clearing of the game/board from the results that's returned from the results class.
CreateGameHandler
Responsible to handle the http CreateGameRequest.
CreateGameRequest
Represents the request to create a new game.
CreateGameResult
Represents the result of creating a new chess game.
CreateGameService
This class is responsible to create a new chess game.
DatabaseException
This exception will be thrown when there is an error with the database
Game
Sets the structure of the Chess game with the default rules that have been implemented.
GameDAO
Responsible for accessing the Games that are available from the database.
JoinGameHandler
Responsible for handling the http request from a user to join a game.
JoinGameRequest
Represents the request of joining a game.
JoinGameResult
This class is responsible for the result of the join game request.
JoinGameService
Responsible to allow players to join a game if the game is available.
ListGameHandler
Handles the http request for listing all the games available
ListGameResult
Represents the result of the list of all possible games the player could join.
ListGamesRequest
Represents the request for listing all available chess games.
ListGamesService
The service responsible for listing all chess games available.
LoginHandler
The handler responsible to handle the http log in request from the user.
LoginRequest
Represents the request of the user trying to log in to the game.
LoginResult
Represents the result from the login request, by the user.
LoginService
Service responsible to handle user logins.
LogoutHandler
Handler for http request from user to logout.
LogoutRequest
Represents the logout request from the user.
LogoutResult
The result object responsible for user logout.
LogoutService
Service responsible for user logout.
RegisterHandler
Handler responsible to handle the http request for a new user to register.
RegisterRequest
Represents the request object for creating a new registration for a new user.
RegisterResult
Represents the result returned from the register request.
RegisterService
Service for new user registration.
User
Sets the structure for the user in the user table in the database.
UserDAO
Responsible for accessing the users information from the database.
